QuestData.Title: Battlefront Triage
QuestData.Description: You seem quick on your feet, $r. I need someone to go out into the chaos of the front and patch up our injured.$B$BTake my kit. It's simple enough to use.$B$BHeal them before the stone troggs finish them off for good.
QuestData.CompletionText: There are more injured Earthen on the front.
QuestData.RewardText: If you ever get tired of your being a $c, come look me up. You seem very good with those fleshy hands of yours.
